p: The study will be conducted in accordance with the approved protocol, ICH GCP relevant regulations and standard operating procedures. Data will be evaluated for compliance with the protocol and accuracy in relation to source documents. Data from case report forms will be entered into a secure bespoke database at the completion of the study followed by data lock. All data will be anonymised: volunteer participant data will be identified by a unique study number in the CRF and database. A separate confidential file containing identifiable information will be stored in a secured location in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
